attributes.action: Make id fraudsters pay back the money they have stolen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Identity fraudsters have no intention of paying back money they have stolen from their victims as the debt is in the victims name. They, the fraudsters know that they cannot be made to repay the debt. The law needs to change to ensure that the fraudsters are made to repay every penny. The victim shold not suffer or be affected in any way. This issue should be given serious and immediate attention.
